CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Approval_Result__c)), NOT(ISBLANK( NST_Pricing_Shadow__r.Approval_Result__c )) ),
IF( AND( BEGINS(Approval_Result__c,'Approve') , BEGINS(NST_Pricing_Shadow__r.Approval_Result__c,'Approve')) ,'Approve','Reject' )
,'Waiting For Approval')
CustomField.label: CAA Final Approver
